H0.text: Eating is the activity through which animals get the carbon that is needed for their bodies.

H1.text: Breathing is the activity through which animals get the carbon that is needed for their bodies.

H2.text: Running is the activity through which animals obtain the carbon needed for their bodies.

H3.text: Sleeping is the activity through which animals get the carbon that is needed for their bodies.

A4.text: heterotrophs receive carbon by consuming other organisms
